Articles.Content:
I updated maltesh's celestial body info spreadsheet to include a Hohmann transfer calculator for both altitude changes and interplanetary transfers. You'll have to download it to edit it, but it provides some pretty useful information. Hohmann calculators are on the 4th sheet (tabs at the bottom).

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AnK-FEkHU7FOdFp6RjhfaEw4aHVuWFZZYmM0T0FBYVE#gid=1
